name: VNSequenceRequestHandler
desc: An object that processes image analysis requests for each frame in a sequence.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CGImage)
items.desc: Schedules Vision requests to be performed on a Core Graphics image.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CGImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on a Core Graphics image with known orientation.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CIImage)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on CIImage data.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CIImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on CIImage data with known orientation.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CVPixelBuffer)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on a Core Video pixel buffer.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CVPixelBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on a Core Video pixel buffer with known orientation.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CMSampleBuffer)
items.desc: Performs one or more requests on an image contained within a sample buffer.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], on: CMSampleBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation)
items.desc: Performs one or more requests on an image of a specified orientation contained within a sample buffer.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], onImageData: Data)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on raw image data.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], onImageData: Data, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on raw data containing an image with known orientation.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], onImageURL: URL)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on an image.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest], onImageURL: URL, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation)
items.desc: Schedules one or more Vision requests to be performed on an image with known orientation, at a specific URL.
